testcase.name: canGetFakultas
testcase.error: org.springframework.jdbc.BadSqlGrammarException: PreparedStatementCallback; bad SQL grammar [SELECT * FROM(SELECT q1.*, Row_number() OVER( ORDER BY q1.nama_mk, kelas) AS RowNum FROM (SELECT KE_KodeJurusan AS kodejur, KE_Tahun AS tahun, kr_semester AS semester, MK_ID AS id_mk, dbo.MKID(MK_ID, MK_ThnKurikulum) AS kode_mk, CASE ? WHEN 'en' THEN mk_mata_kuliahinggris ELSE MK_Mata_Kuliah END AS nama_mk, mk_mata_kuliahinggris AS nama_mk_inggris, MK_KreditKuliah AS sks, KE_Kelas AS kelas, KE_Terisi AS terisi, KE_DayaTampung AS daya_tampung, KE_PE_NIPPengajar AS nip_dosen, PE_NamaLengkap as dosen, PE_NipBaru AS nip_baru FROM derived.cacheKelasDitawarkan WHERE (KE_KodeJurusan <> ?) AND coalesce(isPengayaan,0) = 1 AND KE_KodeJurusan NOT IN ('__MKU','__TPB') AND COALESCE(KE_ID_LingkupPengayaan, 0)<>3 AND (KE_IDSemester = ? ) AND (KE_Tahun = ? ) ) AS q1) AS q2 WHERE rownum BETWEEN
